statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE tickets_sold > 1000
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP'
SELECT event_id, event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ticket_type FROM ticket_sales_data
SELECT SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets_sold, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM ticket_sales_data
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT event_name, tickets_sold, revenue FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE tickets_sold > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT ticket_type, SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales_data GROUP BY ticket_type;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, revenue FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE ticket_price > 50 AND revenue < 10000 ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_tickets;
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE tickets_sold > 100;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, tickets_sold FROM event_tickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM event_revenue;
SELECT * FROM event_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_name DESC
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE tickets_sold < 100
SELECT event_id, ticket_type, SUM(ticket_price) AS total_revenue FROM event_tickets GROUP BY event_id, ticket_type HAVING total_revenue > 500
SELECT event_id, event_name, revenue FROM event_revenue WHERE net_profit > 0 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT event_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM event_revenue GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000
SELECT * FROM EventTickets;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM EventTickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, tickets_sold FROM EventTickets WHERE tickets_sold > 100;
SELECT event_id, event_name, ticket_price FROM EventTickets WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id, event_name FROM EventTickets ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventTickets ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM EventTickets WHERE tickets_sold > 100 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT event_name, revenue_amount FROM EventTickets JOIN RevenueTracking ON EventTickets.event_id = RevenueTracking.event_id WHERE revenue_amount > 500 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name FROM EventTickets JOIN EventAttendees ON EventTickets.event_id = EventAttendees.event_id ORDER BY event_name ASC, attendee_name DESC;

SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM EventTickets JOIN EventAttendees ON EventTickets.event_id = EventAttendees.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendees > 50 ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50
SELECT * FROM tickets
SELECT event_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM Venues WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT ticket_type, price, ticket_status FROM Tickets WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM Events WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM Venues WHERE venue_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM Events WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, venue_name, location, ticket_type, price FROM Events JOIN Tickets ON Events.event_id = Tickets.event_id;
